tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Yatin has been our family doctor for more than 7 years now *** ** *********** *** ** *** **** ******* ** ***** I don't recollect seeing any other doctor in Mumbai since the time we have known Dr. Yatin. He not only gives sufficient time to the patient to understand their problem but also identifies the root cause to avoid recurrence. He will only prescribe what is required for the treatment and wouldn't ask one to take unnecessary tests. If you are looking for a general physician to prescribe the right medicines and timely treatment for your problem, Dr. Yatin is the man to go!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Yatin has been our physician for almost 4 years now. His promptness in replying and ability to tackle and resolve any of my family issues has been remarkable. * ** ********* **** *** **** ********* ** ********* *** ***** **** ******** He doesn't immediately recommend Antibiotics as most Doctors these days do, focusses on body's natural healing first. Thanks Yatin!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Wait time,
review: Dr Gadgil was friendly and professonal throughout. He looked visibly quite surprised when he felt my lymph nodes and saw a rash, which was a bit alarming for me, but otherwise he was very reassuring. He promptly recommended a range of blood tests and referred me to a dermatologist who he called during the consultation. He has also responded very promtly to follow up e-mails. Overall I feel in very safe hands with Dr Gadgil.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
My wife were facing cough problem since past 4 months , especialy in the night time . Visted some good doc b4 but medicines didnt worked for her.

Then we visited Dr. Yatin few days back .he took the detailed history from us and gave her medicines acordingly . I can see positive improvements in my wife helth since that time ... i am really happy with treatment ..
reply_text: Glad to hear that she s getting better..thanks for the kind words..

tags: None
review:
I found Dr Yatin a very nice and experienced doctor with unassuming manners. He listenef to my problem very patiently and sympathetically. His approach to the malady was very professional.
After his treatment I am fully cured. Thanks to him. I also found the atmosphere of the clinic very nice.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
The first thing that strikes you about the clinic is, it is SQUEAKY CLEAN. 

Having visited 2 other doctors, Dr. Gadgil's listening skills matched with his grasp on my medical condition was truly a relief. He takes the time to explain in simple language your exact condition and how best to tackle it. His very modern approach to treatment is much appreciated and recommended.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr. Yatin Gadgil advised us when our helper was suspected for COVID19 and it turned out negative. Her condition was not improving for over a week but with Dr. Gadgil’s advice her condition improved in 3 days. He was extremely friendly and patient with us.. I will recommend him to everyone. Thanks a lot Dr. Yatin Gadgil!

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Type 1 Diabetes Treatment,Pre and Post operative conditions,Outpatient treatment,
review:
Dr. Gadgil has been our family dr for over 12years. Initially visited him for back pain n since then he has been our go to dr for every ailments n we never been let down by him.
 ** ****** ** ** ********* * **** ************* ******* Very thorough in his approach and takes good care of his patients. It is very easy n comfortable to approach him with your health issues as he listens to your problems n gives right treatment. Would  highly recommend him . ---

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Dr. Gadgil treated me for viral hepatitis. ** ********* ****** *** an amazing human being, he hears you patiently and picks up on ailment in a jiffy. He gives as good a verbal treatment as a medical one. His professionalism and expertise helped me cure quickly and completely. I express my heartfelt gratitude to him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Yatin Gadgil is friendly yet professional. He knows his job, which is evident from his line of questioning. Above all he is unassuming, confident of his knowledge and expertise. He is such a welcome change from some doctors of my generation who think the sun shines out of their mouths and other orifices.  I have no hesitation in recommending him. He is bound to treat his patients as equal to himself. Someone  I would call a true gentleman.
reply_text: Thank u so much!for the kind words!

review: ** ***** ** *** *** ** ** ** *** **** ** **** **** *** he explains it so well and his medicine works must visit this doc if u are diabatic you will surely recover .I can just say he has saved my dads life as his all reports were bad and now its come to all normal .
reply_text: Glad that your father is doing well..thanks for the kind words!god bless!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Yatin Gadgil is a confident and trustworthy doctor and I had a wonderful experience. 
I was detected positive for Covid19 and was referred to Dr Yatin. Although my symptoms were not severe, the virus being new of a kind, I had constant tension in my mind and wanted to recover as early as possible. I was under home quarantine but was constantly in touch with doctor. What I realised is that Coronavirus is more of a mental illness than physical . But being under observation of Dr Yatin really helped me fight the illness , stop panicking and helped me recover in hardly a 5-6 days. My symptoms started reducing and in no time my report was negative in second test. I thank Dr Yatin for all his service and help extended.
reply_text: Thanks so much for the kind words!
